entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
